target_title: MVSFormer: Multi-View Stereo by Learning Robust Image Features and Temperature-based Depth
target_caption: Table 1: Quantitative point cloud results (mm) with Accuracy (Acc.), Completeness (Cop.), and Overall (Ovl.) on DTU [1] (lower is better). Best results are in bold, and second ones are underlined. * means that GBiNet [40] is re-tested with the same post-processing threshold to all scans for fair comparisons with other methods.
source_title: Curvature-guided dynamic scale networks for multi-view stereo
